fr.liglab.icasa.self.star.temperature.management.exercice.three.temperature.manager

Interface TemperatureManagerAdministration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TemperatureManagerAdministrationImpl

    public interface TemperatureManagerAdministration
    This interface allows to configure the temperature manager responsible for configuring the temperature controller.

      • temperatureIsTooHigh

        void temperatureIsTooHigh(String roomName)
        This method is called every time a user think the temperature is too high in a given room.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the room where the temperature should be reconfigured
